name: Puzzle Spy Escape Room
description:
Have you ever wanted to play Keep Talking and No One Explodes and A WAY OUT all in one go? Or just want a challenging 2 player co-op game? 

This is it!

2 Players have been trapped in a research office facility and must escape by solving codes on doors together to progress through the rooms, and leave the facility all in one piece as by the time you and your team member have reached past all door locks....there's a dangerous surprise!
